local_intent: Perceive the Pepsi can and move to a safe 5 cm overhead approach pose, verifying arrival.
assumptions: Pepsi can is visible and reachable on the table
Collision-free vertical approach path exists to 5 cm above the can
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive and approach phase of the global plan: scan/detect, then MoveAbove the Pepsi can, verifying position before subsequent alignment and push.
